labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: Gives error and says 'You already have a verified phone'
data.expected_result: Shoot a text to my phone number to verify it
data.short_description: When trying to change phone number under 'My Account', it just says 'You already have a verified phone'
data.steps_to_repro: - Connect a phone number to your account - Click 'Change Phone Number' - Type in a different number and press 'Send'
